SALES       Summary    Over 17 years of sales and operations management experience in specialty and big-box retail and 4 years sales experience in the automotive sector.  Experienced in hiring, training, supervision, and coaching.  Proven skills in operations and human resource management, planning, negotiating, organizing and overseeing projects, and events. Committed to the highest work ethic and attainment of organizational goals and objectives.      Highlights          Excellent interpersonal and coaching skills  Sales leadership development  Performance metrics  Detail-oriented   Procedure development    Employee engagement  Conflict resolution      On-boarding and training  Recruiting  Performance coaching and counseling   Operations management    Human resources management    P&L management   Powerful negotiator              Accomplishments       Drove store ranking from 297 in company to top 10 in less than 6 months of taking over store    Increased year-over-year sales by  60% .    Oversaw multiple stores in the Southeast and worked directly with local management to drive sales and operational success.   Initiated sales and merchandising policies that were adopted company-wide.     Recipient of Best Buy's Top Gun Award multiple times for sales and productivity.       ? personality:
Based on reading between the lines of this resume, here's my personality assessment of this candidate:

1. Natural Leader & Mentor
- Consistently takes on leadership roles
- Strong pattern of mentoring and developing others
- Seems to genuinely enjoy helping others grow (multiple mentions of training, coaching, mentoring)

2. Results-Driven Achiever
- Takes pride in quantifiable accomplishments (driving store ranking from 297 to top 10)
- Consistently exceeds metrics and goals
- Not afraid to take initiative (developed new tools, processes)

3. Adaptable & Growth-Oriented
- Has worked across multiple industries (retail, automotive)
- Willing to take on additional responsibilities (filled in as F&I manager)
- Shows progression in career responsibilities

4. Strong Work Ethic
- Maintains high activity levels (30-60 calls daily)
- Takes on multiple roles when needed
- Long-term commitment to roles (several multi-year positions)

5. Systems Thinker
- Creates and implements new processes
- Focus on efficiency and improvement
- Sees big picture (store layout, customer experience)

6. People-Oriented Professional
- Strong focus on customer service
- Emphasis on team development
- Tactful in handling conflicts

7. Self-Starter
- Takes initiative to develop new programs
- Creates tools to track performance
- Implements new approaches without being asked

This appears to be someone who is naturally ambitious but also genuinely people-oriented, combining drive for results with strong interpersonal skills. They seem to thrive on improving systems and developing others, suggesting both analytical and emotional intelligence.

Their background in Religion/Psychology also hints at someone who values understanding human behavior and motivation, which likely contributes to their success in sales and leadership roles.
